disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.main_message: This medication review tool is currently in the testing phase.
disclaimer.point_1: The tool may contain errors or inaccuracies in its analysis and recommendations.
disclaimer.point_2: All information provided by this tool must be manually verified by a qualified healthcare professional.
disclaimer.point_3: Do not rely solely on the output of this tool for making clinical decisions.
disclaimer.footer_message: By accepting, you acknowledge that you understand and agree to manually verify all information.

login.title: Login
login.invalid_password: Invalid APB number or password. Please check your credentials.

ui.mobile_not_supported_message: This application requires a larger screen to function properly. Please use a desktop or laptop computer.

medication.search_hint: Start typing to search medications (minimum 2 characters)
medication.delete_all_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete ALL medications for this review? This action cannot be undone.
medication.select_cnk_instruction: Multiple medications match this name. Please select the correct one:
medication.cnk_match_failed: Could not automatically match medication to CNK
medication.no_vmp_warning: This medication does not have a VMP code. Therapy adherence matching may be limited.

modals.no_contraindications_found: No contraindications found matching your search.

tools.gheops_description: Ghent Older People's Prescriptions - Community Pharmacy Screening Tool
tools.gheops_help: This tool screens medications for potential inappropriateness in elderly patients. Warnings are grouped by type. Add notes to document your observations.
tools.gheops_load_error: Failed to load GheOPS data. Please try again.
tools.gheops_no_warnings: No GheOPS warnings found for the current medications.
tools.gheops_note_placeholder: Enter your observations or notes for this warning...
tools.gheops_lijst_4: Drug interactions with specific relevance for elderly
tools.gheops_anticholinergic_high_rationale: This medication has high anticholinergic activity. May cause cognitive impairment, confusion, dry mouth, constipation, urinary retention, and increased fall risk in elderly patients.
tools.gheops_anticholinergic_low_rationale: This medication has low anticholinergic activity. May contribute to anticholinergic burden when combined with other anticholinergic medications.
tools.gheops_anticholinergic_additional_ration: This medication has supplementary anticholinergic effects that may contribute to the total anticholinergic burden.
tools.gheops_medication_to_avoid: Medications to avoid in elderly patients with poor renal function
tools.gheops_medication_to_avoid_rationale: This medication should be avoided in elderly patients with poor renal function due to increased risk of adverse effects or drug accumulation.
tools.gheops_fall_risk_rationale: This medication may increase the risk of falling through mechanisms such as sedation, orthostatic hypotension, or impaired balance. Special attention required for elderly patients.
tools.questionnaire_file_too_large: File size must be less than 50MB
tools.questionnaire_description: Upload a PDF questionnaire to display and review it here. Use the note button to add observations saved to Part 1: General Questions.
tools.start_stop_description: Screening Tool to Alert to Right Treatment - Screening Tool of Older Persons' Prescriptions
tools.start_stop_help: This tool provides criteria for potentially inappropriate prescribing in older adults. START criteria identify medications that should be considered, while STOPP criteria identify medications that should be avoided.
tools.no_dispensing_data: No dispensing data available for this medication
tools.other_contraindications: Other contraindications not in patient's condition list

anamnesis.title: Anamnesis
anamnesis.select_category: Select a category to view questions
anamnesis.clear_all_answers_confirm_message: This will delete all answers from all parts of the anamnesis for this medication review. This action cannot be undone.

questions.anxiety: Does the patient have concerns or anxiety about their medications?
questions.medication_purpose: Does the patient understand the purpose of each medication?
questions.correct_dosing: Does the patient know the correct dosing?
questions.falls: Number of falls in past 6 months
questions.hospitalizations: Number of hospitalizations in past year
questions.prescribed_intake: Is the medication taken as prescribed?
questions.intake_problems: What problems does the patient have?

notes.add_comment: Add your comment about this note...

pdf.patient_concern_tooMany: Does the patient feel they take too many medications?
pdf.patient_concern_financialBurden: Does the patient experience financial burden from medications?
pdf.patient_concern_anxiety: Does the patient have concerns or anxiety about medications?
pdf.patient_concern_untreatedComplaints: Does the patient have untreated complaints?
pdf.medication_help_hasAssistance: Does the patient have assistance taking medications?

reports.patient_summary_desc: Letter for the patient with medication recommendations
reports.doctor_summary_desc: Letter for the prescribing physician with observations
reports.pharmacy_summary_desc: Internal review notes for pharmacy use

reports.header_section_desc: Set the document title and opening salutation
reports.recommendations_section_desc: List of medication recommendations for the patient
reports.observations_section_desc: Clinical observations for the prescribing physician
reports.no_items_yet: No items yet. Click 'Add Item' to begin.

csv_import.title: Import Medications from CSV or Excel
csv_import.instructions: Upload a CSV or Excel file (.csv, .xlsx, .xls) exported from your pharmacy system.
csv_import.instruction_1: First row must contain column headers
csv_import.review_subtitle: Review each medication and approve before completing the import
csv_import.error_invalid_file_type: Please select a CSV or Excel file (.csv, .xlsx, .xls)
csv_import.error_conversion_failed: Failed to convert Excel file. Please ensure the file is valid.
csv_import.error_invalid_cnk: Please enter a valid 7-digit CNK code
csv_import.confirm_delete_medication: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
csv_import.confirm_cancel_import: You have unapproved medications. Are you sure you want to cancel the import?
